Package org.mvp4j.annotation

Annotation Types Summary
Action The scope of this annotation is the view, use this annotation to define an action to be executed when a certain event has happened in a component of the view.
Actions The scope of this annotation is the view, use this annotation to define more than one action in the same view component
Model The scope of this annotation is the view Use this to annotate the input component and bind it to the property name of the model The value seized on the input component value will automatically stored in the value of associated property model Example :
MVP The scope of this annotation is the view Use this to annotate a class as view and associate two class as presenter and model view Example :
